meanings.definition: A celestial body orbiting around a planet.
meanings.sent1: The satellites in space orbit around Earth.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the movement of satellites around planets.
meanings.sent3: The satellites in the sky play a game of tag around the planets.
meanings.sent4: The satellites in orbit act like loyal moons to the planets.
meanings.sent5: The satellites circling the planets create a mesmerizing dance in the night sky.

meanings.definition: A device used to receive or transmit signals for communication or navigation.
meanings.sent1: My phone relies on satellites to send messages.
meanings.sent2: The GPS system uses satellites to guide us on the road.
meanings.sent3: The satellites in the sky chat with each other to help us find our way.
meanings.sent4: Satellites are like messengers carrying signals across the world.
meanings.sent5: The satellites above us work tirelessly to keep us connected.

meanings.definition: A country or state that is under the control or influence of another more powerful country.
meanings.sent1: The small island nation became a satellite of the neighboring country.
meanings.sent2: The satellite country had to follow the rules set by the larger nation.
meanings.sent3: The satellite state was like a little sibling always following the big brother.
meanings.sent4: The satellite nation orbited around the dominant country's decisions.
meanings.sent5: The satellite region was under the watchful eye of the more powerful nation.
